fhir_comments: ObservationValue	 Example SNOMED CT for coded results which includes Organism names, Findings, and Qualifier, Substance, and  Body Structure hierarchies.  This should cover >90% of observation results .

copyright: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement
publisher: HL7 International - Orders and Observations WG
description: Codes identifying atomic results of observations when value is type codeableConcept. This value set includes all the children of SNOMED CT Concepts from SCTIDs 404684003 Clinical finding (finding), 410607006 Organism (organism),362981000 Qualifier value (qualifier value), 105590001 Substance (substance), and 123037004 Body structure (body structure).  It is provided as a suggestive example
name: SNOMED CT Codes

fhir_comments: the children of SNOMED CT Concepts from SCTIDs 404684003 Clinical finding (finding), 410607006 Organism (organism),362981000 Qualifier value (qualifier value), 105590001 Substance (substance), and 123037004 Body structure (body structure)..
the children of SNOMED CT Concepts from SCTIDs 404684003 Clinical finding (finding);
the children of SNOMED CT Concepts from SCTID 410607006 Organism (organism)
the children of SNOMED CT Concepts from SCTID 362981000 Qualifier value (qualifier value)
the children of SNOMED CT Concepts from SCTID 105590001 Substance (substance)
the children of SNOMED CT Concepts from SCTID 123037004 Body structure (body structure).
